message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product holds significant value to me, reflecting over $12,000 in development and innovation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored for you, taking into account its value to both parties. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise while ensuring you receive exceptional value. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.
